channel.title: Services on Cerebral | Security
channel.description: Recent content in Services on Cerebral | Security

item.title: Security Trainings
item.description: Security Training is the process of providing formal cybersecurity education to your employees about a variety of information security threats and your company’s policies and procedures for addressing them. As Cerebral Sec, we offer high quality trainings to organizations and IT professionals. Our main training topics as follows; • Security Awareness • Practical Web Application Penetration Testing • Practical Penetration Testing • Practical Mobile Application Penetration Testing • Binary Exploitation • Malware Reversing

item.title: Penetration Tests
item.description: Penetration test, generally known as pentest or ethical hacking, is an authorized simulated cyber attack on a computer system, performed to evaluate the security of the system. Pentest should not be confused with a vulnerability assessment. The test is performed to identify both weaknesses (also referred to as vulnerabilities), including the potential for unauthorized parties to gain access to the system’s features and data, as well as strengths, enabling a full risk assessment to be completed.

item.title: Consultancy Services
item.description: Security Consultancy Services is a complement of services intending to measure and improve cyber security levels on the basis of a methodological approach for system, network and security needs of institutions and organizations. Security Consultancy Services are offered through Security Consultants appointed as per specific needs of organizations. We can help you if you are in need the following areas; • Creating and Managing a Bug Bounty Program • Building SOC from Scratch • Operational Security Consultancy • Building Secure Infrastructure Architecture

item.title: Research and Development
Code Audits
item.description: Our approach to code audits is only for White Box analysis where a secure environment arranged for the test process. Programming advancement measures are long, burdensome and regularly iterative cycles bringing about thousands lines of code created by groups of engineers, extremely inclined to human errors. A secure code development cycle should be adopted by the development team. We also offer consultancy for developing secure application architectures.
